00034  SUBROUTINE PostCollision
00035 
00036 !  Common Variables
00037  USE Domain
00038  USE LBMParams, ONLY : f, g
00039  USE MPIParams
00040  USE MPI
00041  IMPLICIT NONE
00042 
00043 !  Local variables
00044  INTEGER :: count, i, j, k
00045  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR
00046  INTEGER :: MPI_REQ(4)
00047  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00048 
00049 !-------- Exchange data for outward f and inward g components ------------------
00050 
00051 ! X direction
00052  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_east_rcv, xsize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(1), MPI_ERR)
00053  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_east_rcv, xsize5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(2), MPI_ERR)
00054  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_west_rcv, xsize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(3), MPI_ERR)
00055  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_west_rcv, xsize5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(4), MPI_ERR)
00056  count = 1
00057  DO k = zl, zu
00058    DO j = yl, yu
00059      f_west_snd(count)          = f(xl ,j,k, 1,now)
00060      g_west_snd(count)          = g(xlg,j,k, 2,nxt)
00061      g_west_snd(count + xsize)  = g(xlg,j,k, 8,nxt)
00062      g_west_snd(count + xsize2) = g(xlg,j,k,10,nxt)
00063      g_west_snd(count + xsize3) = g(xlg,j,k,12,nxt)
00064      g_west_snd(count + xsize4) = g(xlg,j,k,14,nxt)
00065 
00066      f_east_snd(count)          = f(xu ,j,k, 2,now)
00067      g_east_snd(count)          = g(xug,j,k, 1,nxt)
00068      g_east_snd(count + xsize)  = g(xug,j,k, 7,nxt)
00069      g_east_snd(count + xsize2) = g(xug,j,k, 9,nxt)
00070      g_east_snd(count + xsize3) = g(xug,j,k,11,nxt)
00071      g_east_snd(count + xsize4) = g(xug,j,k,13,nxt)
00072      count = count + 1
00073    END DO
00074  END DO
00075  CALL MPI_SEND(f_west_snd, xsize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00076  CALL MPI_SEND(g_west_snd, xsize5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00077  CALL MPI_SEND(f_east_snd, xsize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00078  CALL MPI_SEND(g_east_snd, xsize5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00079  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(1), status, MPI_ERR)
00080  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(2), status, MPI_ERR)
00081  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(3), status, MPI_ERR)
00082  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(4), status, MPI_ERR)
00083 
00084 ! Y direction
00085  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_north_rcv, ysize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(1), MPI_ERR)
00086  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_north_rcv, ysize5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(2), MPI_ERR)
00087  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_south_rcv, ysize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(3), MPI_ERR)
00088  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_south_rcv, ysize5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(4), MPI_ERR)
00089  count = 1
00090  DO k = zl, zu
00091    DO i = xl, xu
00092      f_south_snd(count)          = f(i,yl ,k, 3,now)
00093      g_south_snd(count)          = g(i,ylg,k, 4,nxt)
00094      g_south_snd(count + ysize)  = g(i,ylg,k, 8,nxt)
00095      g_south_snd(count + ysize2) = g(i,ylg,k, 9,nxt)
00096      g_south_snd(count + ysize3) = g(i,ylg,k,16,nxt)
00097      g_south_snd(count + ysize4) = g(i,ylg,k,18,nxt)
00098 
00099      f_north_snd(count)          = f(i,yu ,k, 4,now)
00100      g_north_snd(count)          = g(i,yug,k, 3,nxt)
00101      g_north_snd(count + ysize)  = g(i,yug,k, 7,nxt)
00102      g_north_snd(count + ysize2) = g(i,yug,k,10,nxt)
00103      g_north_snd(count + ysize3) = g(i,yug,k,15,nxt)
00104      g_north_snd(count + ysize4) = g(i,yug,k,17,nxt)
00105      count = count + 1
00106    END DO
00107  END DO
00108  CALL MPI_SEND(f_south_snd, ysize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00109  CALL MPI_SEND(g_south_snd, ysize5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00110  CALL MPI_SEND(f_north_snd, ysize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00111  CALL MPI_SEND(g_north_snd, ysize5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00112  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(1), status, MPI_ERR)
00113  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(2), status, MPI_ERR)
00114  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(3), status, MPI_ERR)
00115  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(4), status, MPI_ERR)
00116 
00117 ! Z direction
00118  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_top_rcv, zsize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, top, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(1), MPI_ERR)
00119  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_top_rcv, zsize5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, top, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(2), MPI_ERR)
00120  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_bot_rcv, zsize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bot, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(3), MPI_ERR)
00121  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_bot_rcv, zsize5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bot, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(4), MPI_ERR)
00122  count = 1
00123  DO j = yl, yu
00124    DO i = xl, xu
00125      f_bot_snd(count)          = f(i,j,zl , 5,now)
00126      g_bot_snd(count)          = g(i,j,zlg, 6,nxt)
00127      g_bot_snd(count + zsize)  = g(i,j,zlg,12,nxt)
00128      g_bot_snd(count + zsize2) = g(i,j,zlg,13,nxt)
00129      g_bot_snd(count + zsize3) = g(i,j,zlg,16,nxt)
00130      g_bot_snd(count + zsize4) = g(i,j,zlg,17,nxt)
00131 
00132      f_top_snd(count)          = f(i,j,zu , 6,now)
00133      g_top_snd(count)          = g(i,j,zug, 5,nxt)
00134      g_top_snd(count + zsize)  = g(i,j,zug,11,nxt)
00135      g_top_snd(count + zsize2) = g(i,j,zug,14,nxt)
00136      g_top_snd(count + zsize3) = g(i,j,zug,15,nxt)
00137      g_top_snd(count + zsize4) = g(i,j,zug,18,nxt)
00138      count = count + 1
00139    END DO
00140  END DO
00141  CALL MPI_SEND(f_bot_snd, zsize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bot, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00142  CALL MPI_SEND(g_bot_snd, zsize5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bot, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00143  CALL MPI_SEND(f_top_snd, zsize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, top, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00144  CALL MPI_SEND(g_top_snd, zsize5, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, top, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00145  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(1), status, MPI_ERR)
00146  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(2), status, MPI_ERR)
00147  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(3), status, MPI_ERR)
00148  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(4), status, MPI_ERR)
00149 
00150 ! Edges along X
00151  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_tn_rcv, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, tn, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(1), MPI_ERR)
00152  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_ts_rcv, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ts, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(2), MPI_ERR)
00153  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_bn_rcv, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bn, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(3), MPI_ERR)
00154  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_bs_rcv, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bs, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(4), MPI_ERR)
00155  count = 1
00156  DO i = xl, xu
00157    g_tn_snd(count) = g(i,yug,zug,15,nxt)
00158    g_ts_snd(count) = g(i,ylg,zug,18,nxt)
00159    g_bs_snd(count) = g(i,ylg,zlg,16,nxt)
00160    g_bn_snd(count) = g(i,yug,zlg,17,nxt)
00161    count = count + 1
00162  END DO
00163  CALL MPI_SEND(g_bs_snd, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bs, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00164  CALL MPI_SEND(g_bn_snd, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bn, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00165  CALL MPI_SEND(g_ts_snd, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ts, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00166  CALL MPI_SEND(g_tn_snd, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, tn, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00167  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(1), status, MPI_ERR)
00168  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(2), status, MPI_ERR)
00169  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(3), status, MPI_ERR)
00170  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(4), status, MPI_ERR)
00171 
00172 ! Edges along Y
00173  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_te_rcv, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, te, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(1), MPI_ERR)
00174  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_tw_rcv, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, tw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(2), MPI_ERR)
00175  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_be_rcv, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, be, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(3), MPI_ERR)
00176  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_bw_rcv, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bw, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(4), MPI_ERR)
00177  count = 1
00178  DO j = yl, yu
00179    g_te_snd(count) = g(xug,j,zug,11,nxt)
00180    g_tw_snd(count) = g(xlg,j,zug,14,nxt)
00181    g_bw_snd(count) = g(xlg,j,zlg,12,nxt)
00182    g_be_snd(count) = g(xug,j,zlg,13,nxt)
00183    count = count + 1
00184  END DO
00185  CALL MPI_SEND(g_bw_snd, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00186  CALL MPI_SEND(g_be_snd, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, be, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00187  CALL MPI_SEND(g_tw_snd, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, tw, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00188  CALL MPI_SEND(g_te_snd, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, te, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00189  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(1), status, MPI_ERR)
00190  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(2), status, MPI_ERR)
00191  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(3), status, MPI_ERR)
00192  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(4), status, MPI_ERR)
00193 
00194 ! Edges along Z
00195  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_ne_rcv, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(1), MPI_ERR)
00196  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_nw_rcv, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(2), MPI_ERR)
00197  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_se_rcv, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(3), MPI_ERR)
00198  CALL MPI_IRECV(g_sw_rcv, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ(4), MPI_ERR)
00199  count = 1
00200  DO k = zl, zu
00201    g_ne_snd(count) = g(xug,yug,k, 7,nxt)
00202    g_nw_snd(count) = g(xlg,yug,k,10,nxt)
00203    g_sw_snd(count) = g(xlg,ylg,k, 8,nxt)
00204    g_se_snd(count) = g(xug,ylg,k, 9,nxt)
00205    count = count + 1
00206  END DO
00207  CALL MPI_SEND(g_sw_snd, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00208  CALL MPI_SEND(g_se_snd, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00209  CALL MPI_SEND(g_nw_snd, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00210  CALL MPI_SEND(g_ne_snd, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00211  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(1), status, MPI_ERR)
00212  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(2), status, MPI_ERR)
00213  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(3), status, MPI_ERR)
00214  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ(4), status, MPI_ERR)
00215 
00216 !-------- Update outward f components for the ghosts ---------------------------
00217 ! X direction
00218  count = 1
00219  DO k = zl, zu
00220    DO j = yl, yu
00221      f(xug,j,k,1,now) = f_east_rcv(count)
00222      f(xlg,j,k,2,now) = f_west_rcv(count)
00223      count = count + 1
00224    END DO
00225  END DO
00226 
00227 ! Y direction
00228  count = 1
00229  DO k = zl, zu
00230    DO i = xl, xu
00231      f(i,yug,k,3,now) = f_north_rcv(count)
00232      f(i,ylg,k,4,now) = f_south_rcv(count)
00233      count = count + 1
00234    END DO
00235  END DO
00236 
00237 ! Z direction
00238  count = 1
00239  DO j = yl, yu
00240    DO i = xl, xu
00241      f(i,j,zug,5,now) = f_top_rcv(count)
00242      f(i,j,zlg,6,now) = f_bot_rcv(count)
00243      count = count + 1
00244    END DO
00245  END DO
00246 
00247  RETURN
00248  END SUBROUTINE PostCollision
00249
